relics.name: Keepsake Ring
relics.flavorText: A keepsake of Luka's mother. Nothing special, but it's a precious memory of Luka's mother.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:aqua
keywords.description: Deal more damage based on how much Calmness you have.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:calmness
keywords.description: Increases damage done by attacks with Aqua.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:feeling
keywords.description: Increases damage done by attacks with Ventus.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:ignis
keywords.description: Deal more damage based on how much Intensity you have.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:intensity
keywords.description: Increases damage done by attacks with Ignis.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:struggling
keywords.description: Increases damage done by attacks with Terra.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:surrender
keywords.description: A Curse that kills you if you have not played any cards on the turn that you drew it.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:terra
keywords.description: Deal more damage based on how much Struggling you have.

keywords.name: Luka_mod:ventus
keywords.description: Deal more damage based on how much Feeling you have.
